data.name: Polybius Square
data.description:
Implement two functions, `encode` and `decode`, to convert to and from the Polybius square encoding. The Polybius square is descriped on Wikipedia here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polybius_square

The `encode` function should take a string and output a pair of numbers for each character. Whitespace should be ignored. The output, though pairs of numbers, should be a string.

The `decode` function should take a string of numbers and output a chracter for each number pair in the input string. Whitespace should be ignored.

Number pairs will select the row first and then the column. The square to use must be the following:

```
  1 2 3 4 5
1 A B C D E
2 F G H I J
3 K L M N O
4 P Q R S T
5 U V W X Y
```

Note that the letter Z is not used - if it appears in the input, simply ignore it. Also ignore any other characters not in the square.
